display.title: Onwards to the Age of Bronze!
description: More resources are always nice. You're getting close to entering the &&6age of Steam&&r - Copper and Tin are required in many &&6Steam Age&&r machines, so check the ore tab to find out what veins they can be found in, and get mining!

If the different ore names are &&bconfusing&&r, you can tell which elements an ore holds at a glance by reading the &&dmolecular formula&&r in its tooltip. Copper is &&oCu&&r, Tin is &&oSn&&r, Iron is &&oFe&&r, and you can consult a &&3periodic table&&r for the rest. It's time to brush up on your chemistry - you'll need it for &&llater&&r.

This quest can be completed with &&9either metal&&r, so you can claim the metal you're missinng as the reward. Be sure to find a source of both soon, as a &&a&&ocertain&&r&&a Copper-Tin alloy&&r will be needed to get through the &&6Steam Age&&r.
